entry.lex: Purple Heart recipient Aaron S. Daggat was born in Maine and, most notably, fought in the Battle of Fredericksburg.
Born in Maine, Purple Heart recipient, Aaron S Daggett has fought in battles, the most notable being the Battle of Fredericksburg.
Aaron S Daggett, born in Maine, fought in the Battle of Fredericksburg. He was given the Purple Heart.
Ab Klink was born in the Netherlands, belongs to the Christian Democratic Appeal party and graduated from Erasmus University in Rotterdam.
Born in the Netherlands, Ab Klink attended Erasmus University Rotterdam and belongs to the Christian Democratic Appeal party.
Born in the Kingdom of Sarawak, Abdul Taib Mahmud, resides in Sarawak and is a member of Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak party.
Abdul Taib Mahmud was born and lives in the Kingdom of Sarawak and is a member of the "Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak" party.
Abdul Taid Mahmud, a member of Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak party, was born in Kingdom of Sarawak and lives in Sarawak.
Born in Miri, Malaysia, and living in, Sarawak, Abdul Taid Mahmud, is a member of Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak party.
Born in Miri, in Malayasia, Abdul Taib Mahmud, resides in Sarawak and is a member of the "Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak" party.
Abdul Taid Mahmud, a member of the Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak party, was born in Miri, Malaysia and lives in Sarawak.
Oladipo Diya was the predecessor of Mike Akhigbe, whose successor was Atiku Abubakar. Abdulsalami Abubakar was in office while Mike Akhigbe was the Vice President.
Abdulsalami Abubakar was in office whilst Mike Akhigbe was Vice President. Oladipo Diya was the predecessor of Mike Akhigbe, who was succeeded by Atiku Abubakar.
Abdulsalami Abubakar was in office while Mike Akhigbe was Vice President who took over from Oladipo Diya and then was succeeded by Atiku Abubakar.
